Notes.Text:
This update for python-pycares fixes the following issues:

Update to version 4.10.0 (jsc#PED-13442):  
    
- CVE-2025-48945: Fixed use-after-free vulnerability may have led to a crash (bsc#1244691).

Vulnerabilities.Description: pycares is a Python module which provides an interface to c-ares. c-ares is a C library that performs DNS requests and name resolutions asynchronously. Prior to version 4.9.0, pycares is vulnerable to a use-after-free condition that occurs when a Channel object is garbage collected while DNS queries are still pending. This results in a fatal Python error and interpreter crash. The vulnerability has been fixed in pycares 4.9.0 by implementing a safe channel destruction mechanism.
